title: House of Cards
description: Alternate Cover Edition: B009LAH1Q6You can't escape Fate....A young nobleman escapes the Reign of Terror in 18th century France to find himself dragged into an even worse fate--a hellish underworld wherein he is cajoled and put on trial by a demon tribunal for crimes he never committed. Can he answer thwart his fate, one worse than the guillotine?
author: Juli D. Revezzo
